name: react-chrome-extension-example
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://trello.com http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://trello.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
